scripts.clean:node_modules: rm -rf node_modules && cd example && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:example && npm run clean:node_modules
scripts.bootstrap: npm install && cd example && npm install
scripts.start: npm run check && cd example && npm run start
scripts.build:example: npm run bootstrap && npm run build && cd example && npm run build
scripts.check: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run format && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.reset: npm run clean:all && npm run bootstrap && npm run check
